word_mean: 尤指眼无明显病变时致盲，如视神经、脊髓或脑病所致。参见amblyopia

sentence.Network_en: Patients in the study suffered from a condition called Leber's congenital amaurosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究中的病人罹患莱伯氏先天性黑内障(Leber'scongenitalamaurosis).

sentence.Network_en: AIM : To explore the cause of peribulbar anaesthesia causing amaurosis fugax.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨球周麻醉致黑朦的原因.

sentence.Network_en: Gaze - evoked amaurosis is an uncommon but pathognomonic symptom of intrinsic orbital mass lesion.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要注视引发黑蒙症,虽然不多见,却是眼窝肿瘤特有的症状.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Greek amaurōsis, from amauroun 'darken', from amauros 'dim'

means.word_mean: 1. partial or total loss of sight without pathology of the eye; caused by disease of optic nerve or retina or brain

auth_sentence.content: This defect causes one form of a rare eye disease called Leber's congenital amaurosis.
